com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface CommandLineConnection2

All Known Subinterfaces:
SSHConnection2, WindowsCommandShell
public interface CommandLineConnection2

A connection to some form of command line, such as an SSH shell, powershell instance, or user shell like bash or cmd.exe.

Method Summary
 void execute(java.lang.String command, java.io.OutputStream stdout, java.io.OutputStream stderr, long timeout)
          Execute a command.
 

Method Detail

execute

void execute(java.lang.String command,
             java.io.OutputStream stdout,
             java.io.OutputStream stderr,
             long timeout)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
Execute a command. The results of the command will be streamed back to the agent through stdout or stderr. The stream used depends on a number of factors, including whether or not the underlying command line implementation separates them (ssh does but telnet does not, for example) and the stream written to by the command itself.

Neither stream is required and can be null. If stdout is not provided then FglAM will log any output received at debug. A null stderr parameter will cause FglAM to log errors for any input received on that stream.

Parameters:
command - The command to execute
stdout - An output stream where normal data will be returned or null
stderr - An output stream where error data will be returned or null
timeout - The timeout for the execution of the command
Throws:
java.io.IOException - The operation could not be executed and/or at least one of the streams has failed
java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - The operation did not complete within the specified timeout
java.lang.InterruptedException - The operation was interrupted before it could complete
